body:
This is what I did in richard:
- https://github.com/pyvideo/richard/blob/master/src/richard/videos/urls.py#L72
- https://github.com/pyvideo/richard/blob/master/tests/test_videos/test_api.py#L33

That's with Django 1.7, I think. I don't know if:
1. that's a good idea
2. there are better ways to do it
3. if it'd work for your case or not
